Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: H. Mucklo
Reviews.Content: Overall, this camera is very handy and compact.  The Look is very sleek and modern.  Technically, the camera takes great photos in various modes, and what I especially like is the smart panoramic mode which allows me to take great views on landscapes.  The touch screen makes is excellent.  I'm satisfied with this purchase except for the price change..

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Zoe
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera and long for it during a long period. But the reason I didn't buy it last time was the price. So I bought the other one even though I like this one. Unfortunately, that one was broken suddenly without any damage. I didnt know the reason and that seller didn't want to be responsible for that camera. I was so angry. Then I bought this one. It works well. I like this color with touching screen. I haven't found any problem until now.

ProductInfo.Features:
Supplied Accessories - Rechargeable Battery (NP-BN1), Battery Charger, Multi Connector Cable, wrist Strap, Paint Pen, CD-ROMFeatures
Ultra-slim body
3.0 Touch screen for easy focus selection & photo viewing
Carl Zeiss Vario-Tessar 4x (25mm-equivalent) optical zoom lens
Optical SteadyShot(R) image stabilization
ProductInfo.Name: Sony T Series DSC-T99/V 14.1 Megapixel DSC Camera with Super HAD CCD Image Sensor (Violet)
